src:
Menengok Jadwal 'Gila' Liverpool di Akhir Tahun, Mundur dari Carabo Cup?
01 Nov 2019, 08:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sukses Liverpool lolos ke perempat final Carabao Cup tidak sepenuhnya disambut gembira oleh manajer Jurgen Klopp. Pria asal Jerman bahkan mengancam Liverpool akan mundur karena jadwal yang begitu padat.
Liverpool menjalani laga dramatis lawan Arsenal di babak 16 Besar Carabao Cup, Kamis (1/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Setelah melalui drama 10 gol, laga di Anfield berakhir dengan skor 5-5.
The Reds akhirnya memastikan langkah ke babak selanjutnya usai menang adu penalti. Liverpool menang dengan skor 5-4. Satu-satunya penendang yang gagal pada babak adu penalti yakni Dani Ceballos.
Berdasar hasil undian, pada babak perempat final, Liverpool alan berjumpa Aston Villa. Laga ini akan digelar di Villa Park pada 17 Desember 2019. Jadwal inilah yang membuat Jurgen Klopp murka.
text:
Look at Liverpool 'Crazy' Schedule at the End of the Year, Withdraw from the Carabo Cup?
Nov 01 2019, 08:25 by Bola.net
Liverpool - The success of Liverpool qualifying for the Carabao Cup quarter-finals was not fully welcomed by manager Jurgen Klopp. The man from Germany even threatened Liverpool will resign because the schedule is so crowded.
Liverpool underwent a dramatic match against Arsenal in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup on Thursday (11/01/2019) early morning hrs. After going through a 10 goal drama, the match at Anfield ended with a score of 5-5.
The Reds finally made sure to step into the next round after winning the penalty shootout. Liverpool won with a score of 5-4. The only kicker who failed in the penalty shootout was Dani Ceballos.
Based on the draw, in the quarter-finals, Liverpool met Aston Villa. This match will be held at Villa Park on December 17, 2019. This schedule is what makes Jurgen Klopp angry.
